paragraphList.text_en: The text introduces various additional resources that are available for further engagement with the content and topics discussed. One avenue is through Thorne, a platform offering products related to the subject matter, with a discount code provided for a 20% off offer. This can be accessed at thorne.com/u/huberman. Furthermore, social media platforms such as Twitter and Instagram, under the handle @hubermanlab, offer an opportunity to stay updated on the latest information and content.
paragraphList.text_zh: 该文介绍了一些可用于进一步参与内容和讨论话题的附加资源。其中一种途径是通过 Thorne 平台，该平台提供与主题相关的产品，并提供 20% 折扣优惠码。 可通过 thorne.com/u/huberman 访问。此外，社交媒体平台如Twitter和Instagram，在用户名为@hubermanlab下提供了一个机会，让您及时了解最新信息和内容。

paragraphList.text_en: Moreover, for those interested in delving deeper into the subject of neuroscience, "Huberman Lab" provides additional content beyond what is covered in the podcast. This includes unique content that offers a different perspective and insights not available elsewhere. By following @hubermanlab, individuals can access this supplementary material and enrich their understanding in the field.
paragraphList.text_zh: 此外，对于那些对神经科学领域感兴趣并希望深入了解的人来说，“Huberman实验室”提供了超出播客内容范围的额外内容。其中包括独特的内容，提供了不同的观点和其他地方无法获得的见解。通过关注@hubermanlab，个人可以获取这些补充材料，并丰富他们在这一领域的理解。

paragraphList.text_en: Additionally, the text mentions a Patreon page, patreon.com/AndrewHuberman, where patrons can further support the creator and potentially gain access to exclusive content or benefits. This platform may offer a more intimate and specialized interaction with the content creator, catering to a dedicated audience seeking more in-depth knowledge or engagement opportunities.
paragraphList.text_zh: 此外，文章提到了一个 Patreon 页面，网址为patreon.com/AndrewHuberman，在那里赞助者可以进一步支持创作者，同时可能获得独家内容或权益的访问权限。这个平台可能为内容创作者提供更亲近和专业的互动，迎合致力于寻求更深入知识或互动机会的忠实观众。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, these additional resources serve as valuable supplements to the primary content, offering discounts, exclusive materials, and platforms for further interaction and learning. By exploring these avenues, individuals can enhance their knowledge, stay updated on the latest developments, and actively engage with the subject matter, ultimately enriching their overall learning experience.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总而言之，这些额外资源是主要内容的有价值的补充，提供折扣、独家材料以及进一步互动和学习的平台。通过探索这些途径，个人可以增加知识，了解最新发展情况，并积极参与主题，从而丰富整体的学习体验。
